AccountIdHeaderOptional.description: The identifier of an Amazon Ads Advertiser Account.
AccountIdHeaderOptional.name: Amazon-Ads-AccountId

ScopeHeaderOptional.description: The identifier of a profile associated with the advertiser account. Use GET method on Profiles resource to list profiles associated with the access token passed in the HTTP Authorization header and choose profile id profileId from the response to pass it as input.
ScopeHeaderOptional.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-Scope

scopes.advertising::audiences: Grants access to data provider APIs
scopes.advertising::campaign_management: Grants write access to campaign management.
scopes.advertising::test:create_account: Grants write access to create test accounts functionality
scopes.cpc_advertising:campaign_management: Grants write access to campaign management. Legacy name (no difference from advertising::campaign_management)

post.description:
Create ad groups

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_edit"]

Create ads

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "creatives_edit"]

Create campaigns

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_edit"]

Create target

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_edit"]

Delete ad groups

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit"]

Delete ads

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit"]

Delete campaigns

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit"]

Delete target

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_edit"]

Query ad_extension - API is in open beta

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "advertiser_campaign_view"]

List ad groups

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_view", "campaign_view", 
"advertiser_campaign_view"]

List ads

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "creatives_view", "advertiser_campaign_view"]

Query campaign

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_view", "campaign_view", 
"advertiser_campaign_view"]

List target

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_view", "campaign_view", 
"advertiser_campaign_view", "campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_edit"]

Update ad_extension - API is in open beta

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit"]

Update ad groups

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_edit"]

Update ads

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "creatives_edit"]

Update campaign

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit", "campaign_edit", "dsp_campaign_edit"]

Update target

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit"]
